content.transcript: Good morning, listeners. Here is today's weather report for the central region. This morning will be mostly sunny with temperatures reaching twenty-eight degrees by midday. However, clouds will move in from the west during the afternoon, bringing scattered showers to coastal areas. The wind will be light, blowing from the southeast at around fifteen kilometres per hour. Overnight temperatures are expected to drop to about nineteen degrees. Tomorrow should be dry and pleasant with clear skies throughout the day.
